The GIGABYTE GS27FC Curved Gaming Monitor offers versatile connectivity options, including two HDMI 2.0 ports, a DisplayPort 1.4, and an earphone jack. The VESA wall-mounting compatibility further adapts the monitor to diverse setups.

full_description:
Gigabyte AORUS CO49DQ 49" 144 Hz Ultrawide Curved Gaming Monitor

The Gigabyte AORUS CO49DQ 49" 1440p HDR 144 Hz Ultrawide Curved Gaming Monitor can fully immerse yourself while exploring expansive worlds and competing. This AORUS CO49DQ monitor completely encloses your vision with a 5120 x 1440 resolution, 1800R curved display, and 32:9 aspect ratio. It is created by merging two QHD OLED panels. With a strong dynamic range and 99% DCI-P3 color gamut coverage, the AORUS CO49DQ offers excellent color accuracy. When paired with compatible graphics cards, AMD FreeSync Pro reduces motion blur, screen tearing, and stuttering from rapid action sequences by utilizing the 144 Hz refresh rate. With laptops that are compatible, USB-C connection enables the transfer of data, video, and up to 18W of power with a single cable. With the inbuilt KVM switch, you may even utilize a single keyboard and mouse pair to operate several devices.

Vivid Color

The 49" OLED panel of AORUS CO49DQM is also factory calibrated to offer 1.07 billion colors, encompassing 99% of the DCI-P3 gamut, and has VESA Display HDR True Black 400 certified high-dynamic range compatibility. Other characteristics include a 1.8 million:1 contrast ratio and a peak brightness of 1000 nits in HDR mode.

Built for Multitasking

The inbuilt dual-port KVM switch of Gigabyte AORUS CO49DQ allows you to operate two independent computer systems with a single keyboard and mouse set, streamlining your productivity. Dual controller compatibility enables Picture-in-Picture (PiP) and Picture-by-Picture (PbP) viewing from several sources simultaneously.

AMD FreeSync Pro

Reduce screen tearing using AMD FreeSync Pro Technology of AORUS CO49DQ Monitor. FreeSync permits the display to dynamically change its refresh rate to the frame rate being supplied by the graphics card, therefore considerably minimizing screen tearing, stuttering, and other abnormalities.

Integrated With Audio

The built-in 5W stereo speaker of AORUS CO49DQ Monitor allows you to enjoy music, movies, and other media. To listen privately, plug a set of headphones into the 3.5mm audio jack.

Ergonomic Design

You can change the screen's height, swivel, and tilt to suit your needs. The display can also be mounted on a wall, swivel arm, or multi-monitor stand using the 100 x 100mm VESA attachment. The AORUS CO49DQ Monitor's screen is perfectly visible at 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles.

The Gigabyte AORUS CO49DQ 49" 144 Hz Ultrawide Curved DQHD Gaming Monitor comes with 3 years warranty.

full_description:
GIGABYTE GS27QC 27" QHD 170Hz Curved Gaming Monitor

The GIGABYTE GS27QC 27" QHD 170Hz Curved Gaming Monitor comes with a 27" VA 1500R curved panel. Boasting a color-rich 108% sRGB color saturation and a true resolution of 2560 x 1440 (QHD), it ensures captivating visuals. The rapid 1ms (MPRT) response time and 165Hz refresh rate (overclockable to 170Hz) keep gameplay smooth and fluid. Equipped with unique features such as OSD Sidekick for convenient settings adjustment, Aim Stabilizer for enhanced accuracy, and Black Equalizer for optimizing dark scenes, it caters to gamers' needs. The monitor's HDR Ready status and flicker-free technology contribute to an enhanced viewing experience. Its connectivity includes two HDMI 2.0 ports, a DisplayPort 1.4, and an earphone jack. The monitor's design allows for tilt adjustment from -5° to +20° and features VESA wall mounting compatibility. With its powerful performance and thoughtful features, the GS27QC is a strong contender in the gaming monitor landscape.

Native 1500R Curvature

GIGABYTE GS27QC 27" QHD 170Hz Curved Gaming Monitor is designed with a 27" 1500R VA panel, bringing the visual experience closer to the human eye's natural curve. A stunning immersive feel awaits, as this curved monitor enhances gaming and content consumption.

High Refresh Rate and Rapid Response

The GIGABYTE GS27QC offers gaming performance with a dynamic 165 Hz refresh rate. It can be overclocked to 170 Hz, delivering an ultra-smooth and responsive experience. The 1 ms response time ensures every motion is captured with precision, minimizing motion blur.

Gaming Features

The OSD Sidekick of GIGABYTE GS27QC 27" QHD 170Hz Curved Gaming Monitor ensures adjusting display options effortlessly. Engage the Crosshair function for enhanced aiming accuracy and utilize the Aim Stabilizer to reduce motion blur while enabling V-Sync. The Timer keeps track of game duration, while the Black Equalizer brings out hidden details in dark scenes.

Connectivity and Compatibility

The GIGABYTE GS27QC Curved Gaming Monitor offers versatile connectivity options, including two HDMI 2.0 ports, a DisplayPort 1.4, and an earphone jack. The VESA wall-mounting compatibility further adapts the monitor to diverse setups.

GIGABYTE GS27Q 27 inch QHD 2K 165Hz Gaming Monitor

The GIGABYTE GS27Q monitor offers an elegantly simple design that minimizes distractions, a 2560 x 1440 resolution that decreases motion blur, and a standard refresh rate of 165 Hz that can be upgraded to 170 Hz. In addition, AMD Free Sync Premium technology, when used with compatible graphics cards, removes screen tearing and stuttering in fast action scenarios. Additionally, GS27Q 27 inch IPS QHD Gaming Monitor supports HDR which provides realistic scenery while exploring broad areas.

Fast In Graphics

The GIGABYTE GS27Q 27 inch monitor panel features a 1ms reaction time and a refresh rate of 165 Hz (or 170 Hz overclocked), which significantly reduces motion blur to provide fluid action scenes. Two further features are a static contrast ratio of 1000:1 and brightness of 300 nits.

Rich Color Effect and Perfect Viewing Angle

The HDR-ready 27 inch SS IPS panel of the GIGABYTE GS27Q Monitor, which covers 105% of the sRGB gamut and offers up to 16.7 million colors, enhances bright highlights and deep shadows in pictures and movies. Technologies with less blue light and less flickering aid to alleviate eyestrain during extended viewing periods.

Gaming Features

The onscreen timer on the GIGABYTE GS27Q 27 inch IPS Gaming Monitor allows you to keep track of the amount of time you've spent gaming. By adding and configuring a crosshair, you can improve your accuracy when playing shooting games. With less motion blur, the aim stabilizer improves targeting and visual clarity.
